name: optc companion
body:
Companion application for optc (Android only for now).

### **What you can do now**
* Lookup game characters and specials

### **Coming Soon**
* better search and filtering for characters
* turtle time and extra island events notification
* friend game (dream state)

### **Link to the actual game -**

* Global - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.namcobandaigames.spmoja010E&hl=en
* Japan - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.namcobandaigames.spmoja010&hl=en
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
